News.Title: C2C Advanced Systems Completes 4 Security and Industrial IoT Projects in Malaysia
News.Summary: C2C Advanced Systems has completed and delivered 4 projects in Malaysia that focus on security and industrial Internet of Things (IoT) applications.

News.Title: C2C Advanced Systems: Stellar 90% Premium Debut on NSE SME
News.Summary: C2C Advanced Systems shares listed at ₹429.40 on NSE SME, a 90% premium to the IPO price of ₹226. The IPO was subscribed 125.35 times overall, with strong demand across investor categories. The company raised ₹99.07 crore through a fresh issue of 43.84 lakh equity shares.
